definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere

sentences.chinese: 操作人員應戴好安全帽。

sentences.english: Every bike rider should wear a safety helmet.
sentences.chinese: 每個騎車人都應當佩戴安全帽。

sentences.english: Both men were wearing hard hats and protective ear pads .
sentences.chinese: 兩人都戴着安全帽和護耳墊。

sentences.english: Please wear helmet to prevent you hairround the revolver. ?
sentences.chinese: 請戴好安全帽，避免頭髮纏人轉輪。

sentences.english: Some of the men have only recently swapped their weapons for blue overalls and yellow hard hats.
sentences.chinese: 他們中一些人最近才換上了藍色工作服和黃色安全帽。

sentences.english: I put on my safety helmet and the glove, and sat on my silver-white colored bike.
sentences.chinese: 我帶上安全帽和手套，帥氣的跨上我的銀白色鐵馬。

sentences.english: It is dark and my cap lamp is a tiny candle in a cavern.
sentences.chinese: 非常的黑暗，在洞裏我安全帽的頭燈就像渺小的蠟燭。

sentences.english: Don't be rash, wear the helmet.
sentences.chinese: 別作冒失鬼，請戴安全帽。

sentences.english: The invention also relates to a heat dissipating device of the safety helmet.
sentences.chinese: 本發明還涉及一種所述安全帽的散熱裝置。

sentences.english: Therefore, it is extremely important for the motorcyclist to wear the helmet.
sentences.chinese: 因此，摩托車騎士戴安全帽是非常必要的。

sentences.english: Protect your thoughts and wear a hard hat.
sentences.chinese: 爲了保護腦部，請戴安全帽。

sentences.english: Please wear helmet to prevent you hairround the revolver. kck?
sentences.chinese: 請戴好安全帽，避免頭髮纏人轉輪。

sentences.english: All visitors to the site must wear safety helmet.
sentences.chinese: 到工地的所有參不雅觀者必需帶上安全帽。

sentences.english: Be sure to have a helmet on at building sites..
sentences.chinese: 在建築工地一定要戴上安全帽。

sentences.english: While on a rig location, wear safety toe footwear and hardhats at all times.
sentences.chinese: 在井場上任何時候都要穿硬頭工鞋和戴安全帽。

sentences.english: Side and explained that workers were removing the helmet hanging on the wall.
sentences.chinese: 這名職工邊解釋邊取下懸掛在牆上的安全帽。
